channel.description: Recent changes in Input objects on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Alerts-X: AccessFilter
item.description: GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> accessID: [ID] <li> <span class="tab"> group: [ID] <li> <span class="tab"> owner: [ID!] <li class="deprecated-button-container p-2"> <button class="btn btn-sm btn-info ml-5" onclick="toggleDeprecatedEntitiesContainer(this)">Show deprecated fields</button> </li> <div class="deprecated-entities-container"> </div> <li>}</li> </ul> Fields <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/scalars/id">group([ID]):</a> <span class="description"></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/scalars/id">owner([ID!]):</a> <span class="description"></span> </li>

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertConfigurationInputAverageTime
item.description:
Configuration for AVERAGE_TIME. Average time is used to verify requests times. There are 3 options: OPTION 1: Can verify average time traffic of a time frame and compare it with an other time frame. (window and historical window) Must set field window and historical windows higher than 0. OPTION 2: Can verify average time traffic of a time frame and compare it with the value max_average. Must set window higher than 0.
[...]

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertConfigurationInputErrorRate
item.description:
Configuration for ERROR_RATE alert type. Error rate alert is used to verify traffic comparing its error codes. Ther are two options. OPTION 1: Can verify traffic of a time frame. Must set window field higher than 0. OPTION 2: Can verify traffic of a specific number of requests. Must set window field as 0 and minNumRequest higher than 0. GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> toCheck: [Int!
[...]

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertConfigurationInputNoTraffic
item.description:
Configuration for NO_TRAFFIC alert type. No traffic alert is used to verify if there is traffic according to the parameters of the alert. GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> periodicity: Int <li> <span class="tab"> window: Int <li> <span class="tab"> timesToAlert: Int! <li> <span class="tab"> timesToRecovery: Int <li> <span class="tab"> noRecoveries: Boolean! <li> <span class="tab"> stateChangesOnly: Boolean! <li> <span class="tab"> minNumberRequests: Int! <li> <span class="tab"> email: [EmailInput]!
[...]

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertConfigurationInputPeakTraffic
item.description:
Configuration for PEAK_TRAFFIC alert type. Peak traffic is used to verify traffic comparing volum of requests between to time frame (window and historical window) . GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> historicalWindow: Int <li> <span class="tab"> offset: Int <li> <span class="tab"> periodicity: Int <li> <span class="tab"> window: Int! <li> <span class="tab"> timesToAlert: Int! <li> <span class="tab"> timesToRecovery: Int <li> <span class="tab"> noRecoveries: Boolean!
[...]

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertInput
item.description:
Alert information. Only one configuration has to be set at once. GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> name: String <li> <span class="tab"> description: String <li> <span class="tab"> configurationNoTraffic: AlertConfigurationInputNoTraffic <li> <span class="tab"> configurationErrorRate: AlertConfigurationInputErrorRate <li> <span class="tab"> configurationAverageTime: AlertConfigurationInputAverageTime <li> <span class="tab"> configurationPeakTraffic: AlertConfigurationInputPeakTraffic <li> <span class="tab"> configurationPrice: AlertConfigurationInputPrice <li> <span class="tab"> isActive: Boolean! item.title: Alerts-X: AlertUpdateConfigurationInputAverageTime
item.description:
Configuration for AVERAGE_TIME. Average time is used to verify requests times. There are 3 options: OPTION 1: Can verify average time traffic of a time frame and compare it with an other time frame. (window and historical window) Must set field window and historical windows higher than 0. OPTION 2: Can verify average time traffic of a time frame and compare it with the value max_average. Must set window higher than 0.
[...]

item.title: Alerts-X: AlertUpdateConfigurationInputErrorRate
item.description:
Configuration update for error rate alert type. Error rate alert is used to verify traffic comparing its error codes. Ther are to options. OPTION 1: Can verify traffic of a time frame. Set window field higher than 0. OPTION 2: Can verify traffic of a specific number of requests. Set window fild as 0 and minNumRequest higher than 0. GraphQL schema definition <li> <span class="tab"> toCheck: [Int!
[...]
